lang.title: Language Settings
lang.description: Bot language used on the server

redirect.title: Redirect Settings

always_quote.title: Always Quote Settings
always_quote.description: Always quote messages when they are sent in these channel(s)
always_quote.help: Ctrl-click or drag to select multiple items. Ctrl-click to deselect items.
